## Component/Feature

Describe the component or feature you'd like added.

## Use Case

When would you use this? What problem does it solve?

## Direction Support

Should it adapt to directions (luxury/cyberpunk/kinetic/freestyle)?

## Examples

Links to sites that implement something similar.

## Additional Context

Any other context, mockups, or code snippets.
